CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS zapzup.message_entity( id VARCHAR(40) PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, content TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP, deleted_at TIMESTAMP, user_id VARCHAR(41), chat_id VARCHAR(41), file_id VARCHAR(41),
CONSTRAINT fk_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES zapzup.user_entity (id), CONSTRAINT fk_chat_id FOREIGN KEY (chat_id) REFERENCES zapzup.chat_entity (id), CONSTRAINT fk_file_id FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES zapzup.file_entity (id) );
